title: Landing Overview
description: Landing overview section with editable content

text1.default: A 5.6-acre landmark in Greater Noida - West where architecture meets aspiration. Envisioned for those who value space, silence, and uncompromising quality, Ashtech Presidential Towers offers 456 residences framed by 80% open greens.

text2.default: This is not just vertical livingâ€”it's living elevated by legacy, refined by detail, and rooted in engineering excellence that has powered India's infrastructure for decades.
